explains: adj. 使人安心的，使人放心的
v. 使放心，使消除疑虑（reassure 的现在分词）

sentences.en: It was reassuring to hear John's familiar voice.
sentences.cn: 听到约翰熟悉的声音令人感到安慰。

sentences.en: I liked her way of reassuring you with a squeeze of the hand.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢她捏捏手来安慰人的方式。

sentences.en: It's reassuring (to know) that we've got the money if necessary.
sentences.cn: 我们有了应急的钱，这就不必担心了。
